data.title: Acura SUV Models
data.meta_description: Find out which Acura SUV fits your style. Understand the differences between Acura SUVs in performance, features, design and more.
data.text:
The torque-vectoring all-wheel drive system SH-AWD® that changed the industry is standard on the RDX and available on the MDX. For the MDX, the SH-AWD system increases max towing capacity to 5,000 lbs.* The ZDX Type S features an exhilarating electric powertrain that delivers thrilling acceleration from 0-60 in under 5 seconds.*

ZDX Electric Motors

The ZDX A-Spec® delivers remarkable power with either single-motor rear-wheel-drive or dual-motor all-wheel-drive. Featuring nearly 500-HP* with the ability to accelerate from 0-60 in under 5 seconds,* the ZDX Type S is the most powerful Acura SUV ever. With two impressive motors to choose from, this all-electric SUV represents a new era of driving dynamics.

Shown: ZDX Type S in Tiger Eye Pearl* with Acura Genuine Accessories.

RDX Engine

The RDX with SH-AWD is powered by a turbocharged 2.0L engine mated to a quick-shifting 10-speed automatic to make use of all 272-HP* effortlessly. Efficiently packaged into a stylish premium performance crossover, the RDX is engineered to lead the way every day.

Shown: RDX SH-AWD in Liquid Carbon Metallic.*

MDX Engines

The MDX offers the proven 3.5L V-6, featuring the same engine block as the championship-winning Acura ARX-05 DPi racecar. For the pinnacle of Precision Crafted Performance, MDX Type S Advance delivers 355-HP* from its exclusive 3.0L Turbo V-6 developed by motorsport engineers.

Shown: MDX A-Spec in Platinum White Pearl.

The ZDX, RDX and MDX elevate your journey through refined craftsmanship, including premium Milano leather standard on the ZDX and available on the RDX and MDX. From performance-focused microsuede to available immersive ambient LED lighting, the ZDX, RDX and MDX satisfy all senses.

Personalized Front Seats

Featuring standard heated and ventilated power adjustable front seats, the ZDX delivers a personalized driving experience for ultimate comfort and support. Enjoy the convenience of driver seat memory for a customized configuration each time you take the wheel.

Shown: ZDX Type S with Orchid Interior.

Cargo Versatility

The RDX has room to spare with up to 79.8 cu.ft. of max cargo volume* when the 60/40-split rear seats are folded down. Intelligently engineered rear cargo underfloor storage can be accessed in any seat configuration, giving you additional versatility to meet the demands of the journey ahead.

Shown: 2024 RDX SH-AWD Technology Package in Performance Red Pearl with Parchment Interior.

Three Rows Of Seating

The first premium SUV with 3 rows of seating standard to comfortably fit up to 7 occupants, the MDX continues to raise the bar with a precision crafted experience for all. With CabinTalk®, the front passengers in the MDX can conveniently connect with everyone in the back, including the third row.

Shown: MDX Type S Advance with Ebony Interior.

The ZDX, RDX and MDX are equipped with AcuraWatch™, a suite of innovative safety and driver-assistive technologies that help enhance driver awareness, avoid collisions and mitigate the severity of an impact.* The ZDX Type S comes with AcuraWatch 360+™,* the latest evolution of AcuraWatch featuring cutting-edge technology like Hands Free Cruise* for more peace of mind with every drive. Alongside AcuraWatch and AcuraWatch 360+, additional available driver-assistive technologies help enhance overall driver awareness from all sides of the vehicle.

Adaptive Cruise Control (ACC) with Low-Speed Follow

ACC helps reduce driver fatigue by maintaining a set speed and interval from the vehicle detected ahead. The low-speed feature will bring the vehicle to a complete stop if the detected vehicle slows to a stop.*

Road Departure Mitigation (RDM)

RDM alerts the driver to an unintentional departure from a detected lane or roadway. The feature is able to apply steering torque and braking to help keep the vehicle on the roadway.*

Blind Spot Information System

Standard blind spot information system monitors the rear and sides of your RDX or MDX to help you detect vehicles in the alert zone of adjacent lanes.*

Surround-View Camera

Get an available 360 view of the space immediately around your RDX or MDX through the navigation display. Guidelines appear in your rear camera view to help you get in and out of tight spots.*

Wireless integration allows your ZDX, RDX or MDX to become a seamless extension of your smartphone. A wide HD Center Display with a range from 10.2-in to 12.3-in will help keep you connected wherever the road takes you.

BANG & OLUFSEN® Sound System

Exclusive to the ZDX and MDX, the premium BANG & OLUFSEN® Sound System immerses the cabin in sound creating the feeling of sitting in a world-class concert hall. Intuitive BEOSONIC® by BANG & OLUFSEN technology customizes the sound experience to the listener's preference both spectrally and spatially with a simple, one-touch control.

Shown: ZDX Type S with Red Interior.

ELS STUDIO 3D®

Elevate your sound experience with up to 25 speakers and over 1000 watts. Tuned by Grammy® award-winning producer Elliot Scheiner, the available ELS STUDIO 3D®* in the RDX fully immerses you in a premium audio experience unmatched by any other in its class.

Shown: MDX Type S Advance with Ebony Interior.

Alexa Built-In

Interact with your RDX or MDX through Alexa. Using your voice, you can easily control music, use navigation, check the weather, control smart home devices and more, by simply asking Alexa.*

Shown: RDX SH-AWD with A-Spec Package and Ebony Interior.

Integrated Dynamics System (IDS) offers various driving modes that help keep the ZDX, RDX or MDX ready for most any condition, from a smoother ride with Comfort Mode to Snow Mode for added confidence when winter arrives. The MDX Type S Advance and ZDX Type S includes a mode for on-demand ground clearance for extreme on-road conditions, while Sport+ and Sport Modes maximize performance.
